baseData.description: Fanfare: Put a follower that originally costs 7 play points or less from your hand into play and destroy it. Deal X damage to a random enemy follower. If no enemy followers are in play, deal X damage to the enemy leader instead. X equals the attack of that follower.

-Followers can't be played.

-Whenever you play an amulet, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
(These effects last until this follower leaves play.)
